try

Overview

try makes it easy to share code to try new things. It aims to draft a solution to address a specific issue.

Installation

Install try from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github(repo = "forestgeo/try")
library(try)

Or with:

source("https://install-github.me/forestgeo/try")

After installing and loading try, get help about the main function with ?map_tag().
